definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing mountain/☶/ancient Chinese compass point: 45° (northeast)

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Yin2 hang2

definition: Central Bank of the Republic of China (Taiwan)

sentences.english: The distribution of mineral resources and the main production corporation of silver in the world are briefly introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文扼要地介绍了银的资源状况及主要生产厂家。

sentences.english: Silver azide does not dissolve in water or in nitric acid.
sentences.chinese: 叠氨化银不溶于水或硝酸。

sentences.english: On his head was a mitre of black felt decorated with silver crescents.
sentences.chinese: 头戴黑毡法冠，冠上饰有银的新月。

sentences.english: Silver and palladium face a similarly loose market.
sentences.chinese: 银和钯同样面临宽松的市场。

sentences.english: Different type of silver deposits is under the control of different geotectonic environments.
sentences.chinese: 不同大地构造环境控制了不同类型的银矿床。

sentences.english: Drain the fish cutlets , arrange them on the rack.
sentences.chinese: 取出银鳕鱼，排放烧烤架上。

sentences.english: How China's banks are welcomed in the stock market?
sentences.chinese: 为何中国的银圝行都受股市欢迎？

sentences.english: New materials such as gilded cobber and silvery threads emerged.
sentences.chinese: 例如，银镀金卡柏线程出现的新材料。

sentences.english: As if to be more like a pedlar , I wear a silver ring.
sentences.chinese: 似乎为了更像一个小贩，我带着一只银戒指。

sentences.english: Because it is a good plating layers of titanium and therefore will never decolorization .
sentences.chinese: 因为是镀了好几层钛银的，因此永远也不会脱色。

sentences.english: Through the grass came a soft silvery tinkling.
sentences.chinese: 从草海中传来了一阵微弱的银叮铃声。

sentences.english: They did not use paper money or gold or silver coins , as Europeans did.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有向欧洲人似的用纸币或是金，银做成的硬币。

sentences.english: Electrodepositing technology of Ag-Cd alloy from cyanide bath was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氰化物体系电沉积银镉合金的工艺。

sentences.english: HE and Gomori, Methenamine Silver (GMS) were used for tissue staining.
sentences.chinese: 对皮肤活检组织行HE及六胺银染色。

sentences.english: This happens because silver undergoes a chemical reaction with sulfur particles in the air.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为银与空气中的酸性物质进行了化学反应。

sentences.english: You can also add 10 drops of colloidal silver as a natural preservative.
sentences.chinese: 你可以加入10滴液态胶粒银作为天然的防腐剂。

definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
brass (alloy of copper 銅|铜[tong2] and zinc 鋅|锌[xin1])
silver currency/currency of the Qing dynasty based on the silver tael 兩|两
(weaving) spindle/ingot/pressed cake of medicine etc/classifier for: gold and silver ingots, ink sticks
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
